attributes.action: Prevent the closure of Chelford Market and Auction House
attributes.background: This closure will be disastrous for the rural community; many will be required to transport livestock further which requires licensing.  At a time when British farming is already struggling these extra costs are unacceptable. Cheshire East Council should prevent closure until it can be relocated.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

http://www.cheshireeast.gov.uk/council_and_democracy/voting_and_elections/petitions/petition_scheme.aspx
